snippet: The last moments in the life of Tayshana Murphy, an 18-year-old who was shot in her Upper Manhattan public housing project, were recounted in State Supreme Court.
abstract: Trial opens in killing of Tayshana Murphy, 18-year-old basketball star who was shot in her Upper Manhattan public housing project; Tyshawn Brockington and Terique Collins are charged with her murder and face up to life in prison if convicted.
lead_paragraph: The last moments in the life of Tayshana Murphy, an 18-year-old who was shot in her Upper Manhattan public housing project, were recounted in State Supreme Court.

headline.seo: Trial Begins in Shooting Death of Tayshana Murphy
headline.main: Trial Opens in the Killing of a Young Basketball Star
headline.print_headline: Trial Opens in the Killing Of a Young Basketball Star
